title: How would one prove the existence of the Universe? - Quora

response.answer_text: How would one prove the existence of their neighborhood? Answer: Look around. Some folks might disagree with you about your definition of your neighborhood but if your definition can be backed up with observations and a reasonable explanation then a reasonable person should accept the term as useful. The same things hold true for a universe. If you claim the universe is larger than they think it is you can demonstrate the tools and methodology you used to come to your conclusion.
Dont have to. You are a portion of it.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Alex S. Gabor
